overview: In the cold mountains of the Chiapas Highlands, memory makes its home. It is in this place where a quest for answers begins â€“ finding on the land a method of resistance, the characters open themselves to a world that does not understand them. The hope and pain of the Original Peoples trigger questions in someone who is amazed, without knowing the reason for it, by their various forms of resistance, the ideology and traditions of these peoples.
title: Don de ser
